name: Arcane Golf
description: Arcane Golf is a miniature golf puzzle game set in a fantasy world full of dungeons, dangers, gems, and geometry. Play across 200 levels set in 4 unique courses inspired by classic adventure games!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.4 gHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000, GeForce 8 Series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 40 MB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible
